name: SUPER-HIT GEAR HONORED
description:
SUPER-HIT GEAR HONORED:

[Made for Weekly Game Jam #67 - Theme: 'Impostor']

You are the notorious Agent 42 and your mission is to save the world from the super villain Victor Victorschoff, a global player who's about to sell THE EVIL NUKE to some very evil guys. Infiltrate his mansion and take him out and/or neutralize THE EVIL NUKE and get out of there safely.

- Graphics inspired by Superhot

- Gameplay inspired by Hitman, Metal Gear Solid & Dishonored (hense the title ;))

- All Assets/Animations except for the flute version of the Mission Impossible Theme and the Unreal Engine Starter Assets are made by Linus Walden and Michael Fry in the 5 days of this Jam

Developing: Linus Walden

3D Modeling: Linus Walden, Michael Fry

Animations: Michael Fry

Level Design: Linus Walden

Rigging: Michael Fry

Voice Acting: Linus Walden, Michael Fry

Special Thanks: Leo Fry (Ideas)

Credit: Mission Impossible Recorder - Recorder Movie Scores

Enjoy.
